document.full_text: the behind-the-scenes member of the "morning joe" band, chris licht, is leaving msnbc and becoming the vice president of programming at cbs news.
document.title: msnbc's chris licht to join cbs news
lines_and_colors: the behind-the-scenes member of the "morning joe" band, chris licht, is leaving msnbc and becoming the vice president of programming at cbs news.
